attributes.action: change the sure start grant so that all under 16s can claim it, no matter how much their guardian/parent earns
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As i young parent i no how tight money can be, but when someone says to you, sorry you cant have this grant because your under 16 and your parents earn to much, it doesnt make the money situation any better. Maybe if you'd been born one day later you could get it... Its not fair.
